attributes.title: HORRIBLE😡😡
attributes.review: this app took A WEEK to download are you kidding me😡 as soon as i got the app it shut down my phone and wiped out all of my memory so i didn’t have any pictures left of my dead dog 😡 0/10 i definitely do not recommend and then it started texting my good friend shakira by ITSELF. now shakira and i aren’t friends anymore thanks to this stupid app. if you value your phone and life don’t download 😡😡

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app I texted number but. When I text The number respond response kill yourself and you’re worth it police would come for me I I installed the app we didn’t vote for Trump Also stop my big toe i’m calling couldn’t resist The hot Chito. I got through it. I’m scared for my Life and my liberty and it’s stole all of my data and sold it to Russia I know because My Family member works with Technology

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: i can’t believe i wasted my time downloading and making sure i would have this app. nope. never. get rid of it. SOOO many things wrong with it, i don’t know where to begin. the opening, having the app, notifications, all of it was just awful! now a different app like tik tok, i learned so much there. here. nothing. delete the app and one star it cause NO. thank you if you one star it and delete <3

attributes.title: not worth it
attributes.review: i’ve had the hardest time with this app and i’m so fed up with it. idk who designed the software’s little system layout thingy but it’s glitchy as hell & takes forEVER to load. you would think the freaking PRESIDENT of the UNITED STATES—who was already a billionaire BEFORE his presidency—would be able to fund an app that at least half way works. but whatever i guess. money doesn’t buy efficacy✨🦄🌼🌷🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! First off it asked for my phone number which is already a NO obviously because DUH RAPIST. Second off, you shouldn’t get this app because it wiped all my data a few days after I got it, so I mean that a red flag. NEXT OFF I heard weird noises coming from my phone after I got this app, it sounded like a scream, like a “I’m running for my life” kinda scream. It was probably baron so we gotta hurry and get him out of there ASAP.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app, I noticed my phone began acting strange. I thought it was something else but a friend told me to think about everything thing I had done prior to. I did several restarts and even spoke to a tech. He was able to narrow it down to the last app I downloaded. This one. After removing the app, my phone and all its functions were as they were/should be.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: When I got it I thought it would be an ok app, however, the games are so rigged after you have it for a while. Not to mention the app wanted me to vote for him. As a cool 17 year old I can’t vote. The app basically wanted me to do something that is against the law. Therefore I believe this app at most deserves a 1 star, although I wish I could give it a negative two. This app will be hearing from my parents lawyers

attributes.title: put my family in a coma 😔
attributes.review: i was so excited to download a digital application to support MY PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES 😤😘, however it did not turn out the way expected! the app runs VERY slowly, much like the speed of Trumps brain, it also is constantly crashes like nations economy and international reputation. it wouldn’t even let me sign up to be a part of Trumps team, which seems sort of elitist if you ask me!!! very DISAPPOINTED AND SAD!!!!!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.review: I wish I could give this 0 stars, or even negative stars. I tried to download this app to stay updated with our president’s re-election campaign, but after downloading and opening this app my phone started glitching and shutting down randomly. Now I can’t use my phone normally and will probably have to buy a new one because apple doesn’t know what went wrong either. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT’S NOT WORTH IT

attributes.title: Please don’t download this 0 STARS
attributes.review: I was on this app and the screen turned black a small text popped up saying “I’ll swipe your knees” I thought nothing of it until later on that day I went out with my family and someone followed us and as soon as they found me alone they repeatedly stabbed my knees with a trump sign. I’m in the hospital and now I’m unable to walk you trumplins are something else..
